title: Corporate Diwali Gifting Ideas - MiceKart Blogs

headings.text: 11.Dry Fruit Box + Greeting Card + Diya set

paragraphs: We at MICEkart.com believe Itâ€™s not the gift, but the thought that counts ðŸ™‚Gifts are a great way to show your employees that you appreciate them in a genuine and thoughtful way. Having said this, festivals are a great time to celebrate their efforts and cherish the association as a team.MICEKart.com brings to you some unique ideas for corporate gifting during this festive season.
Size: 3.5 x 1.50 inch (L x H).Weight: 80 grams.Material: Crystal & Brass.
Inclusions: 5 Rocket, 2 ZameenChakri, 2 Rassi Bomb, 2 Anar.Weight: 120 grams.
Flavors- Soft Fills, Nut Fills & Crispies.Quantity : 12 Pcs

A beautiful and attractive design set.Brushed with gold & silver coating.Crafted with floral designs whichadd a royal appeal to the set.,comprising of 2 Bowls, 2 Spoons &1 Tray.Diameter of the Bowls : 4 Inches.Tray Size : 8 Inches x 4.5 Inches.
Make the festival memorable with thegoodness of yummy sweets.This festival order a boxof special Kaju Badamand Anjeer mixed sweets.Weight: 800 Grams.
Inclusions: California Almonds ,Roasted Salted Pistachios,Cashews , Green Afghan Raisins.Weight : 600 gms
Make this diwali special by sending a warm diwali greeting along with dryfruit box and diya.
It is not just about selecting the gifts and givingit to someone. A gift becomes complete with anattractive packaging.
We stand by this concept and believe that anattractive looking gift is enough to brightensomeoneâ€™s day / festival.
